title: Showcase Presents: Adam Strange, Vol. 1
description: This value-priced collection features over 500 pages of classic science fiction adventures. After being mysteriously teleported to a distant world by an alien scientist, Adam Strange went from being an Earth archaeologist to a cosmic adventurer. He soon became the hero of the planet Rann, shuttling between his old and new worlds via the Zeta Beam. These tales capture the optimism of the 1960s Space Age as Adam Strange defends his new homeworld from alien threats.
author: Gardner Fox
